Keywords: Celebrity , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Mary Jane Watson
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Secret Identity
PETER, YOU CAN BE AN EXTRA IN MY SUPERHERO MOVIE!: When establishing themed teams, characters on your starting force with the Celebrity keyword gain the Spider-Man Family keyword.
WIRE WORK: Sidestep. [Flight symbol], but only if Marvella has no action tokens.

Comments
October 3, 2020
mc268
She’s worth the price of admission to add Mysterio, John Cena, Adam West and Zatanna to a Spidey team, but she’s really good on her own too. Empower, sidestep, situational carrying, incap and barrier. I’ll always play her main dial with a Defenders Black Cat so her husband can help her remedy her soft defences. Really good for 15 points, she’d be a must play on all teams if her common counterpart wasn’t so darn sensational. As a secret identity, she’s good, strong damage potential, charge and empower. After a couple games playing her I’m also realizing she has range, that’s useful too.
September 22, 2020
BridgeGuy
Barrier, empower, wildcard, & sometimes taxi for 15 pts. I'll take that! I'll even take that over Kite Man. Hell yeah! TTPC for celebrity team is icing on the cake.
September 10, 2020
Hellboy the Bellboy
Strong keyword manipulation for minimal points.
